entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: SSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
